title: Wendy's Twitter Page Is Savage
text:
Wendy’s Twitter Page Is Savage Where's the beef? On Wendy's timeline. Feb 21st, 2017 Photo: Lester Cohen (Getty). 
There is something endearing about a corporation that isn’t afraid to have some fun…especially with internet trolls. To many companies, Twitter is a tool — like a screwdriver — it’s not much fun and more than likely you needed the other kind with the flathead. Others, however, use Twitter like a nail gun. They aren’t afraid to pin down things that probably could have been ignored. For instance, Denny’s has a great Twitter account that puts out some creative content that promotes their brand. But when it comes to calling people out on their crap, it’s Wendy’s that takes the cake…err, burger. Wendy’s Twitter Page Is Savage
